City Council
============

Physical Address:

3815 Sachse Rd.  
Building B  
Sachse, TX 75048

Phone:

[469-429-4773](tel:4694294773)

[Email: lgranger@cityofsachse.com](mailto:lgranger@cityofsachse.com)
